title: the server did not provide an etag [apache2+mod_pagespeed]
body:
i'm using oc 6 on apache2 with mod_pagespeed module enabled.

after syncing, the client always reported the error `the server did not provide an etag` (only for `.html`) files which prevents the client from correctly detecting file changes.

after disabling pagespeed for the oc vhost in apache:
```
<virtualhost *:80>
# ...
modpagespeed off
# ...
</virtualhost>
```
the error is gone and apache sends again an etag.

i read in issue #416 that oc doesn't support mod_pagespeed (yet) thus it should be mentioned somewhere in the installation guide to disable mod_pagespeed, e.g. here: http://doc.owncloud.org/server/6.0/admin_manual/installation/installation_source.html#apache-configuration
add the following lines to the apache config:

```
<ifmodule pagespeed_module>
        modpagespeed off
</ifmodule>
```

thanks!
